author: Sumptuous Erotica : Alvin and Vivian vs. Barisan Nasional
content: [...] How about the political message I got from the Selangor BN coordinator on Malaysia day (pictured), or an invitation to participate in a political poll I got barely 3 days ago. Why isn’t the MCMC acting on these broadcasted messages rather than worrying about an interview with a blogger or looking for gays online? [...]
